scripts.flex: bun run build:web && bun run src/index.ts
scripts.build:web: cd web && bun install && bunx vite build && cd .. && bun scripts/embed-dashboard.ts
scripts.compile:win: bun run build:web && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 ./src/index.ts --outfile flex-windows-x64.exe
scripts.compile:mac: bun run build:web && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 ./src/index.ts --outfile flex-darwin-x64
